CRenderGraphPin
public
IRenderGraphPin
public
CRefCount
CRenderGraphPin

Implementation of IRenderGraphPin

Members
m_type

type of data transfered over this pin

m_name

name of this pin

m_connections

pins this pin is connected to

m_parent

parent IRenderGraphNode this pin is exposed by

m_isInput

indicates whether this pin is an input (true) or output (false)

m_defaultVal

defines a default value to assign to the pin if the pin is not connected. If empty then parent's pins are searched for value
